title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Looking for more information? Explore the other pages in this section to learn more. Park News Check out our latest news and press releases or find us in social media. Nature Wolf Trap also provides a natural enclave in the midst of an increasingly urbanized northern Virginia. Education Get resources for Teachers and Students alike to learn about Wolf Trap. Kids & Youth Learn about the activities and opportunities for kids and youth. Park Management Policy documents and important information about park management.
